title: How to score above a 620 in the Karnataka SSLC board exam - Quora

response.answer_text: Scoring 620 in SSLC board exams is very difficult thing to do. We should have proper English grammar and spelling knowledge .we should be thorough with maths problem we have to understand the social science concept perfectly so that we know to write the answer correctly. If you are weak in Kannada then practicing to write spelling is must because it would be a disadvantage to score full marks in Kannada science concept must be thoroughly learnt as there are changes of coming twisted questions. We should be attentive in the class and listen to the teachers .we should clear our doubts. We have to refer last year's question papers, blue prints,key answers, etc. At last a month before the exam we must daily try to solve the question papers so that we may have the time sense and try to finish the paper as soon as we can. We should not be over confident of the exam. Not to be nervous about the exams.It not that everyone may get 620 marks, sometime it not only depends on how we execute our knowledge and experience ,but LUCK also matters
